short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create Amazon Affiliate link in a single click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quickly create Amazon Affiliate links in a single click while browsing Amazon.


This extension is for those creating many links to Amazon Affiliated products. just click the icon whilst browsing an Amazon product and the affiliate link will be copied automatically.  You can easily change the Affiliate ID to your own on options. 

Please note that this extension defaults to my Amazon Affiliate ID. Make sure you change this in the options or I will be getting free money :)
